description:
crypto/x509: Added RFC 5280, section 4.2.1.14 to parseCertificate and buildExtensions
Support for CRL Distribution Points

messages.text:
LGTM with nit.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10258043/diff/5001/src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go
File src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10258043/diff/5001/src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go#newcode666
src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go:666: type crlDistributionPoints []distributionPoint
It would be nice to remove this type - it adds very little.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, agl@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10258043/diff/5001/src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go
File src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10258043/diff/5001/src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go#newcode666
src/pkg/crypto/x509/x509.go:666: type crlDistributionPoints []distributionPoint
On 2013/06/13 15:53:06, agl1 wrote:
> It would be nice to remove this type - it adds very little.

Done.

Did you do the online form, or fax it?
